attributes.title: Server-side experimentation, with Tom van den Berg & Ruben de Boer (Online Dialogue)
attributes.summary: Learn what makes server-side testing different from client-side testing, if can you use both simultaneously and what the common mistakes are you need to avoid.
attributes.description: Guest 1: Tom van den Berg URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/tom-van-den-berg | Guest 2: Ruben de Boer URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/ruben-de-boer
